## ToolboxCategory.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `ToolboxCategory` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(categoryDef: CategoryInfo, parentToolbox: IToolbox, opt_parent?: ICollapsibleToolboxItem);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  categoryDef | [CategoryInfo](./blockly.utils_namespace.toolbox_namespace.categoryinfo_typealias.md) | The information needed to create a category in the toolbox. |
|  parentToolbox | [IToolbox](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.md) | The parent toolbox for the category. |
|  opt\_parent | [ICollapsibleToolboxItem](./blockly.icollapsibletoolboxitem_interface.md) | _(Optional)_ The parent category or null if the category does not have a parent. |
